explains: n. 锹，铲；（纸牌中的）黑桃（spades）；黑桃牌；<旧>黑人，黑鬼
v. 用锹挖（地），用锹铲（土）；把……弄实抹平
wordGroup: in spades [美俚]坦率地；肯定；非常

sentences.en: The spade jarred on something metal.
sentences.cn: 铁锹撞在什么金属物件上发出刺耳的声音。

sentences.en: I grabbed the spade and started digging.
sentences.cn: 我抓起铁锹开始挖了起来。

sentences.en: Whatever does that want a spade for?
